lineplot_direction_colors <- c(
      "Dark gray" = "grey25",

      "Blue" = "#005AB5"
    )
outcomes_name = "banana"
compact_fig_cap2 <- glue::glue(
  '[{{names(lineplot_direction_colors)[2]}}]{color="{{lineplot_direction_colors[2]}}"}',
  " lines indicate {{outcomes_name}}s that moved to later positions ",
  "between the left-hand subgroup and the right-hand subgroup. ",
  '[{{names(lineplot_direction_colors)[4]}}]{color="{{lineplot_direction_colors[4]}}"}',
  " lines indicate {{outcomes_name}}s that moved to earlier positions. ",
  '[{{names(lineplot_direction_colors)[3]}}]{color="{{lineplot_direction_colors[3]}}"}',
  " lines indicate {{outcomes_name}}s that did not change positions.",
  " Line opacity levels indicate the number of positions changed ",
  "(higher opacity represents more positions changed).",
  .open = "{{",
  .close = "}}"
)
